Services

Have a problem? Here's a few ways we can solve it.

Custom App Design

We're Ruby evangelists and passionate members of the Rails faithful. Have an idea for an web app or a problem to solve? Let us build your solution.

Consulting

Have an app or other solution already deployed but it's not what it could be? We can help you get it there!

Support

Is your app problematic? Our fresh eyes can be just what the doctor ordered to nurse it back to health.

About

The First City Software 'Origin Story'

  • August 2016

    Our Humble Beginnings

    In IT for 14 years and closet coder since the age of 12, I started to do freelance work on Ruby on Rails projects with small companies and startups in the Savannah area.

  • February 2017

    An Idea Takes Shape

    Realizing that these small companies and startups presented a real need for custom-built applications, First City Software was born! It's mission is simple; help companies and startups solve problems with code.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!
